messages.title: My Pledges to You
messages.content: My commitments cover local issues like opposing overdevelopment and promoting better transport links, as well as defending workers' rights and protecting workers from the 'bedroom tax'.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protecting our country's economy, identity and our Assembly's powers from a Conservative power grab.
Demanding that every single penny we lose from Europe is replaced by Westminster.
Funding new Welsh hospitals, valleys, roads, schools and providing affordable homes with our multibillion pound investment programme.

mentions.candidate: Byddaf yn ymgyrchu'n ddiflino am well cysylltiadau trafnidiaeth ac yn gwrthwynebu cynlluniau datblygiadau anaddas sy'n groes i bolisi cynllunio lleol ac yn niweidiol i amgylchedd ein prifddinas.

issues.brexitEurope: Plaid's Brexit Promise: Our MPs will get the best deal for Cardiff North and for Wales.
issues.economy: Demanding that every single penny we lose from Europe is replaced by Westminster.
issues.environment: I will oppose any inappropriate developments that goes against existing planning policies and guidelines and the principle of protecting the environment of our capital city.
issues.governance: Protecting our country's economy, identity and our Assembly's powers from a Conservative power grab.
issues.socialWelfare: Defending workers from the 'bedroom tax' and protecting workers' rights.

housing.content: Providing affordable homes with our multibillion pound investment programme.

images.caption: Images of Welsh hospitals, coins, roads, police signage, and Steffan Webb with another individual.
